thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Ian and Lynne
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Ian and Lynne

author: Ian and Lynne
title: Ian and Lynne
text: We were amazed by the beauty and the diversity of the Jordanian people. Our Guide brought the true heart of Jordan's magic to sing against the stunning backdrop of it's complex history and stunning vistas. Our group was diverse in ages, abilities and background, yet thru the intuitive and compassionate approach of our Guide, everyone was involved in everything and completed the most physically challenging tasks. Thank you.
